text: ai meree qaum ke logo! aaj tumhaaree baadashaahee hai. dharatee mein prabhaavee ho. kintu allaah kee yaatana ke muqaabale mein kaun hamaaree sahaayata karega, yadi vah ham par aa jae?" firaun ne kaha, "main to tumhen bas vahee dikha raha hoon jo main svayan dekh raha hoon aur main tumhen bas theek raasta dikha raha hoon, jo buddhisangat bhee hai.
